title: In the Victorian era, if an adult husband and wife got baptised at the same time, would the wife's maiden name be recorded? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, normally. She would be Mary Harris daughter of George amd Mary , labourer with ‘now wife of James Willis. It would depend on the clergyman, as usual, but all the cases I have sseen, the parson isd so pleased to have ‘saved a brand from the burning’, of being chapel, that he makes the most of the occasion. Less often, the age is stated - mostly ‘of mature years’ is the most entered
